attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!! 🤬😡
attributes.review: I am really disappointed w this app 😡 As soon as I download it I felt kinda dizzy 🥴 I though it was nothing until I opened the app, and I blacked out 😵 I woke up in this small orange 🍊 prison dungeon place 🤔 then I realized I couldn’t stand up because my legs was replaced with two giant feathers 🤦‍♀️!!! Then I realized, my hands 🖐🤚 were replaced with smol lamps?!?!? I turned my head to see what was behind me because I heard strong heavy breathing 💨 and it was HIM!!! THE CHEETO!!! HE KIDNAPPED ME YALL 🤭!!!! IM TYPING THIS RN BECAUSE HE FORGOT TO TAKE MY PHONE 📱 AND HE IS GRABBING HIS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN HAT 🧢 . OH NO HE COMIN BYYYYEE 👹🙈

attributes.title: i was SCAMMED 🙀😳
attributes.review: so i downloaded the app to vote for my voluptuous 🍑 thicc 😻 president 🤩 but instead was met with a HORRIFIC 💀 site 😳 there was a stale, overgrown shrimp 🙀waiting for me 😿 so i closed out of the app and in front of me stood barney 👺 and he possessed me 🤯 then obama ran into my room and started performing cpr to get out the purple dinosaur 👿 i fainted 😔 and woke up in a hospital bed 😷 i asked the doctor “where’s obama?” 🤭 and she said “who do u think gave u their pure soul?” 😵 and then markly thicc king walked in and said “he’s in a better place now 😭” and then i voted for him 😌 and died 😽🙊

attributes.title: Not what I expected 😔
attributes.review: When I joined to support the ✨best president in the history of presidents✨ they hacked my phone, sent inappropriate videos, and talked about my dead grandpa when i deleted it and went to go let a load off came back and my bird was looking at my phone then started violently throwing up and then he exploded, roaches started to crawl out of my walls and pooping and mating everywhere and my grandma died and her last words were trump 2020 😏this is not what i expected at all. 👎🏾~ xoxo stacythemacie

i tried using the app peacefully but then a virus popped up and next thing i know a orange man was on the screen i quickly uninstalled the app to cause no more harm to my eyes. Some weeks later, i started to hear weird things coming from under my bed and it didn’t sound like any human. I think that what ever this app had is messing up my life. All because this app. This app has some ghosts attached to it. Im not happy with this app and would like it to be removed completely. 🧚🏻‍♀️😻😝👽 -karen

attributes.title: BEWARE! APP STEALS PERSONAL DATA
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, suspicious activity began to occur on my phone. I believe I got hacked! I cannot understand why my favorite president would create such an app that hacks people! Pictures and personal data was removed from my phone. I am very worried that I will not be able to get any of that back. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! IT IS VERY DANGEROUS. Now whenever I try to open the app, it glitches out, and when I try to delete it my whole phone glitches!!😠 I am very disappointed with this app.

attributes.title: This app is sickening🤮
attributes.review: This app is honestly so terrible. Why is there little kids on a app for a prejudice rapist. This is not an opinion is a fact. I honestly don’t see how this man is going “Make America Great Again” if number one, America was NEVER great AND America is only “great” for those who have PRIVILEGE! A person of color can’t even go outside to take out the trash without having to deal with consequences. I could write more but it will be a full book so i’m gonna end it now. Trump 2020 is getting old. 🙄

attributes.title: Stinky smelly poopoo
attributes.review: Gen z can and WILL destroy what they please, including this garbage app. Y’all think because we can’t vote and we are teenagers, we don’t understand what’s going on and don’t have a voice. But there are millions of us, we understand how corrupt the president is and how many he’s harmed. I personally do my research and can see why he his such an awful president. I recommend whoever’s reading this to do the same. Don’t believe everything Fox News OR CNN feeds you. Seek information from both sides.

attributes.title: Trump 2020 App
attributes.review: This app has everything we need. If the other platforms go down for censoring us, this is a sure fire back up plan to stay connected. I love how I can register for events (online & local) as well as share them on my Twitter page. Thank You, TEAM TRUMP! 🇺🇸💥 #MAGA2020 #DigitalActivist

attributes.title: Disappointing 😔
attributes.review: As a long time Trump supporter 🇺🇸🤩I was hyped to download this app but seeing as he was asking for my phone number I was horrified😟🤭.That could only mean one 1️⃣ thing: our great leader doesn’t have 🚫 all the answers and honestly I don’t know what to believe in anymore I came looking for his private photos but left shocked😱. My beautiful orange baby 🍊👼 disappointed me 😔.I guess the only thing I can say right now is chicken 🐓 wing 🍗 chicken 🐓 wing 🍗 hotdog 🌭 and baloney ✨ chicken 🐔 and macaroni 🍝 chillin 🥶 with my 😘 homies 👯‍♀️

attributes.title: 🧚🏾‍♂️HORRIBLE🧚🏾‍♂️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app one night around 3pm in the summer around thanksgiving and it was the worst experience i’ve ever had in my entire life . there are many paintings on this app but there all painted in spanish . every single time i open the app my phone blows up and i have to put it back together . maybe one day it will actually help me instead of showing me nude pictures of kanye west and kim k . i really hope one day they will figure out how to fix this app .
